It's not possible to get a report for each crop because the app at the moment gives me the option to generate report for the fi...Full ReviewDear support, i meant adding a feature that can help we farmers to generate an expense report for a given plant. For instance, i have planted Onion and tomatoes in Field A. It's not possible to get a report for each crop because the app at the moment gives me the option to generate report for the field.
